ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Scorpion Stingers
ygData.msgSnippet: /em cringes from the powerful Rokenn slap Pah!  So we have 2 selections of wind instruments (Scorpion stingers and bamboo sticks off a vendor), but no drum or
ygData.messageBody:
/em cringes from the powerful Rokenn slap

Pah! So we have 2 selections of wind instruments (Scorpion stingers and
bamboo sticks off a vendor), but no drum or lute vendors?

/em ponders setting up shop and selling drums for a ridiculous price

Bien - the merchant?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reeves, Patrick W [SMTP:pwr3@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 4:43 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Scorpion Stingers
>
> /bonk Bien
>
> They work fine as wind instruments and are better then store bought. They
> have the same bonus (+15%) as mino horns. Unless they have been changed
> since I tested one last month.
>
> Rokenn
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Lonnie Lewis [mailto:llewis@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 1:35 PM
> > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Scorpion Stingers
> >
> >
> > I think someone on the list said that they don't work as wind
> > instruments.
> > It was a couple of weeks ago, so I don't remember for sure. :(
> >
> > On another note, I've got a level 3 Iksar Shammie, we should group up
> > sometime Beat ;)
> >
> > Bien
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: beatdropbattledrum@...
> > [SMTP:beatdropbattledrum@...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 4:32 PM
> > > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > > Subject: [eqbards] Scorpion Stingers
> > >
> > > Last night I logged in with my newbie Iksar Monk (Level 3) and was
> > > killing scorpions in the Field of Bone. I killed 4 Scorpions (blue
> > > con) and got two Stingers (wind instruments). I am mentioning this
> > > because I haven't heard anyone bring up the FoB scorpions,
> > but I have
> > > heard people talking about the scorpions in Overthere. Someone was
> > > asking about instruments in Kunark. I was thinking that for those
> > > bards playing in Kunark a lot. This is probably a good place to
> > > stock up on *flutes*. Just offer some money to newbie Iksars to
> > > bring you some. I also haven't explored too much of this
> > zone, but I
> > > bet that there are more scorpions scattered about and probably real
> > > easy to stock up on these. Just thought I would mention
> > this bit of
> > > info ;)
> > >
> > > I usually have tons of mino horns in the bank for corpse
> > recovery and
> > > I tend to destroy them once I am back to my corpse and collecting
> > > lots of loot.
> > >
> > > ~Beatdrop Battledrum
> > > 44th Bard of the Karana Server
> > >
> > >
